name: phylogenetic-tree
title: PhylogeneticTree
description: A branching diagram that shows the evolutionary relationships between dwc:Organisms.

fields.name: phylogeneticTreeID
fields.title: Phylogenetic Tree ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: phylogeneticTreeProtocol
fields.title: Phylogenetic Tree Protocol
fields.description: A description of or reference to the Protocol used to make a PhylogeneticTree.

fields.name: phylogeneticTreeProtocolID
fields.title: Phylogenetic Tree Protocol ID
fields.description: An identifier for a Protocol used to make a PhylogeneticTree.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: phylogeneticTreeReference
fields.title: Phylogenetic Tree Reference
fields.description: A bibliographic reference in which a PhylogeneticTree is mentioned.

fields.name: phylogeneticTreeRemarks
fields.title: Phylogenetic Tree Remarks
fields.description: Comments or notes about a PhylogeneticTree.
